nodes.text: A royal palace on the mining planet Shu-Torun was the home of the planet's king and his children, Monthan, Hollian, and Trios. The Sith Lord Darth Vader visited the palace in order to investigate why Imperial ore quotas were not being met. Having turned against the Galactic Empire, the king tried to kill the Sith using several traps, but failed and was killed by Vader's assassin droids BT-1 and 0-0-0.
The palace first appeared in the comic book Darth Vader Annual 1, which was written by Kieron Gillen and illustrated by Leinil Francis Yu for publication in 2015.
